Cuddasaka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Nahetuduka
Cuddasaka
1184Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā…pe…  napacchājātapaccayā naāsevanapaccayā nakammapaccayā navipāke ekaṃ, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ…pe… .
